member.name: T:LaviniaApi.Controllers.v3.NOController
member.summary: Controller that serves data regarding political elections in various levels, for the Mandater project at the University of Oslo, department of political science

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Controllers.v3.NOController.#ctor(LaviniaApi.Data.NOContext,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{LaviniaApi.Controllers.v3.NOController})
member.summary: Constructor for the ApiController, enables database access and logging
member.param: NOContext object that allows access to the database
Logger that gives information about the context of a log message

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Controllers.v3.NOController.GetYears
member.summary: Returns a list of all election years available in the API. The list is sorted so the most recent years are at the top of the list.
member.returns: List of all election years in the database

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Controllers.v3.NOController.GetParties
member.summary: Returns a map from party code to party name for all parties in the API.
member.returns: Map from party code to party name for all parties.

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Controllers.v3.NOController.GetDistricts(System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Returns a list of all districts for a given year in the API.
member.returns: List of all districts for a given year.

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Controllers.v3.NOController.GetVotes(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of all Party votes that meet the required parameters.
member.param: One to N character party code
member.returns: Party votes meeting the requirements

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Controllers.v3.NOController.GetPreviousVotes(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of all Party votes from a number of elections before the specified year.
member.param: One to N character party code
member.returns: Party votes for a number of elections

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Controllers.v3.NOController.GetMetrics(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of all District metrics that matches the required parameters.
member.returns: District metrics matching the requirements

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Controllers.v3.NOController.GetPreviousMetrics(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of all District metrics from a number of elections before the specified year.
member.param: Number of District metrics to return
member.returns: District metrics for a number of elections

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Controllers.v3.NOController.GetParameters(System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Returns a list of all Election parameters that matches the required parameters.
member.returns: Election parameters matching the requirements

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Controllers.v3.NOController.GetPreviousParameters(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Returns a list of all Election parameters from a number of elections before the specified year.
member.returns: Election parameters for a number of years

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Data.NOInitializer.Initialize(LaviniaApi.Data.NOContext,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger)
member.summary: Initializes the database, if the db is empty this method will build a model to seed it.

member.name: T:LaviniaApi.Utilities.AlgorithmUtilities
member.summary: Utility class to make operations surrounding the Algorithm enum more practical

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.AlgorithmUtilities.NormaliseAlgorithm(System.String)
member.summary: Accepts a string and returns the matching algorithm enum. If no matching enum can be found it throws an ArgumentException.
member.param: The name of the algorithm to be converted.
member.returns: An algorithm enum

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.AlgorithmUtilities.IsAlgorithm(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether the name matches any algorithm we know.
member.returns: True if we have an enum for the algorithm, false otherwise.

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.AlgorithmUtilities.TryParseToString(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Attempts to convert the name to an algorithm. If it is successful it returns true and pushes the Algorithm to the algorithm variable. Otherwise it returns false and pushes Algorithm.Undefined to the algorithm variable.
member.param: Where the algorithm should be returned.
member.returns: True if successful, false otherwise.

member.name: T:LaviniaApi.Utilities.ElectionFormat
member.summary: Represents the parsed values of a line from the Elections.csv file

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.ElectionFormat.Parse(System.String,LaviniaApi.Utilities.FieldParser)
member.summary: Parses a line following the ElectionFormat and returns an ElectionFormat object
member.returns: An ElectionFormat object containing the parsed values

member.name: T:LaviniaApi.Utilities.ResultFormat
member.summary: Represents the parsed values of a line from the results files

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.ResultFormat.Parse(System.String,LaviniaApi.Utilities.FieldParser)
member.summary: Parses a line following the ResultFormat and returns an ResultFormat object
member.returns: An ResultFormat object containing the parsed values

member.name: T:LaviniaApi.Utilities.CountryFormat
member.summary: Represents the parsed values of a line from the Countries.csv file

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.CountryFormat.Parse(System.String,LaviniaApi.Utilities.FieldParser)
member.summary: Parses a line following the CountryFormat and returns an CountryFormat object
member.returns: An CountryFormat object containing the parsed values

member.name: T:LaviniaApi.Utilities.ElectionTypeFormat
member.summary: Represents the parsed values of a line from the ElectionTypes.csv file

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.ElectionTypeFormat.Parse(System.String,LaviniaApi.Utilities.FieldParser)
member.summary: Parses a line following the ElectionTypeFormat and returns an ElectionTypeFormat object
member.returns: An ElectionTypeFormat object containing the parsed values

member.name: T:LaviniaApi.Utilities.CountyDataFormat
member.summary: Represents the parsed values of a line from the CountyData.csv file

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.CountyDataFormat.Parse(System.String,LaviniaApi.Utilities.FieldParser)
member.summary: Parses a line following the CountyDataFormat and returns an CountyDataFormat object
member.returns: An CountyDataFormat object containing the parsed values

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.ETNameUtilities.NameToCode(System.String)
member.summary: Accepts a string and returns the matching code. If no matching enum can be found it throws an ArgumentException.
member.param: The name of the ElectionType code.
member.returns: A string code

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.ETNameUtilities.CodeToName(System.String)
member.summary: Accepts an ElectionType code and returns the full name. If the code is not recognized an ArgumentException is thrown.
member.param: The ElectionType code to be converted.
member.returns: The full name of the ElectionType

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.ETNameUtilities.IsElectionType(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether the name matches any ElectionType we know.
member.returns: True if the name is in our dictionary, false otherwise.

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.ETNameUtilities.TryParse(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Attempts to convert the name to a code. If it is successful it returns true and pushes the code to the code variable. Otherwise it returns false and pushes null to the code variable.
member.param: Where the code should be returned.
member.returns: True if successful, false otherwise.

member.name: T:LaviniaApi.Utilities.FieldParser
member.summary: A class for parsing the fields from a string array.

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.FieldParser.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The constructor takes the path of the file to be parsed, used to provide meaningful exception information.
member.param: Path of the file being parsed
The separator used to separate the fields in the file

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.FieldParser.ParseLength(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Verifies that the string array matches the expected length.
member.returns: A string array containing the extracted fields
member.exception: Is thrown if the line has incorrect length

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.FieldParser.ParseAlgorithmToString(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Parses a string to any of the known algorithms.
member.returns: The Algorithm parsed from the string
member.exception: Is thrown if the string does not match any known algorithm

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.FieldParser.ParseInt(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Parses a string to an integer value.
member.returns: The integer parsed from the string
member.exception: Is thrown if the string cannot be parsed to an integer

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.FieldParser.ParseDouble(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Prases a string to a duble value.
member.returns: The double parsed from the string
member.exception: Is thrown if the string cannot be parsed to a double

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.FieldParser.ParseString(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Verifies that a string is within certain length restrictions. Checks if the string length is greater or equal to the minLength (inclusive), and that it is less than the maxLength (exclusive). Set the maxLength to -1 to allow unrestricted length.

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.ModelBuilder.BuildDistrictMetrics(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{LaviniaApi.Utilities.CountyDataFormat})
member.summary: Takes a list of CountyDataFormat and builds a list of DistrictMetrics
member.returns: A list of DistrictMetrics

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.ModelBuilder.BuildElectionParameters(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{LaviniaApi.Utilities.ElectionFormat},System.String)
member.summary: Takes a list of ElectionFormat, an election type and a list of DistrictMetrics, and returns a list of ElectionParameters. The returned list contains information about which parameters were used for each election.

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.ModelBuilder.BuildAlgorithmParameters(LaviniaApi.Utilities.ElectionFormat)
member.summary: Takes an ElectionFormat, extracts information about the algorithm used and returns an AlgorithmParameter
member.param: ElectionFormat - Information about a particular election
member.returns: AlgorithmParameters - Parameters used in the election

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.ModelBuilder.BuildPartyVotes(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{LaviniaApi.Utilities.ResultFormat},System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Takes a list of ResultFormat, an election type and an election year, and returns a list of PartyVotes. The returned list contains information about how many votes each party got in each district for a particular election.
member.param: Which year the election was held
member.returns: List of PartyVotes
